sentences.text: At PG&E Corporation, the positions of chair and CEO have been separate since March 1, 2017, when Anthony F. Earley, Jr. became Executive Chair of the Board and Geisha J. Williams became CEO and President.

sentences.text: Prior to that time, Mr. Earley had served as the Chairman, CEO, and President of PG&E Corporation since September 13, 2011, and the positions of chairman and CEO were combined.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Separating these roles at this time ensures a smooth officer transition as Ms. Williams assumes a broader leadership role at PG&E Corporation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Among other things, Mr. Earleys extensive utility and leadership experience, including his executive experience at PG&E Corporation, will allow him to support Ms. Williams transition into her new role as CEO and President and to serve as an effective link between the Board and the CEO, especially during this transition period.

sentences.text: 2016 STIP Structure and Results
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For 2016, the Committee adopted a STIP structure that continued PG&E Corporations and the Utilitys focus on improving public and employee safety and customer satisfaction.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The weights of the components - Safety, Customer Satisfaction, and Financial - were unchanged from 2015 at 50 percent, 25 percent, and 25 percent, respectively.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Safety component was structured to provide a strong focus on the safety of employees, customers, and communities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It was made up of four subcomponents: (1) Nuclear Operations Safety, (2) Electric Operations Safety, (3) Gas Operations Safety, and (4) Employee Safety.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For 2016, Timely Reporting of Injuries was added as a safety measure with a 4 percent weight.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The measure was designed to support early intervention, avoid exacerbation of medical problems, and reinforce the companies Speak Up culture.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To accommodate the added measure, the weights of the Lost Workday Case Rate and Serious Preventable Motor Vehicle Incident Rate measures were each reduced from 8 percent in the 2015 STIP to 6 percent in the 2016 STIP.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Customer Satisfaction measures were designed to incent employees to be more responsive to customers needs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As in prior years, corporate Financial performance was measured by PG&E Corporations actual earnings from operations compared to budget.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each STIP measure has a threshold, target, and maximum level of performance used to arrive at a score ranging from zero to 2.0 for that measure.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Performance below the minimum performance level, or threshold, results in a zero score.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Performance at the threshold results in a STIP score of 0.5.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Target performance results in a STIP score of 1.0, and performance at or above the maximum established level results in a score of 2.0.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A score of 1.0 provides 100 percent of an executives target payout.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Performance at the threshold and maximum levels delivers 50 percent and 200 percent of targeted payout, respectively.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Linear interpolation is used to determine scores for performance between threshold and target, and between target and maximum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The STIP overall performance score is the sum of the weighted cumulative average scores for performance on each of the STIP measures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: An NEOs final STIP score also may be increased or decreased by an individual performance modifier, which can range from 0 percent to 150 percent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The individual performance modifier is determined by the Committee based upon the CEOs assessment of an executives performance, or the applicable Boards assessment in the case of the CEOs or any Utility Presidents performance, for the year.
